title:
What is the problem with the Cape Fear Memorial bridge on the westbound lanes at the transition form the pavement to the grating. The grating is 1 1/2 to 2 inches higher than the pavement and every time you cross it you get a resounding thud.

The bridge is just not sitting level.

Cannot be good for my suspension much less the damage it is doing to my tires. I cannot remember when it was not that way. Why can\'t it be fixed. Seems to me while it was closed off and on for TWO years for painting it could have been fixed.
